title: Rewrite Pagination Parameters for Reranking
description: Rewrite "start" and "rows" parameters to request constant number of documents from Solr and apply "start" and "rows" pagination to response at the end of the pipeline. Used in conjunction with Fusion stages that rerank documents

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

rowsFromSolrToRerank.title: Number of Results
rowsFromSolrToRerank.description: Number of results to request from Solr, to be reranked by downstream stages.
